tuv.seg: The Junior Cycle covers the first three years of secondary school. Children begin their second-level education around the age of 12 or 13
Déantar freastal ar dhaltaí idir 12 leis an tSraith Shóisearach agus is iondúil go seasann daltaí an scrúdú agus iad 15 nó 16 bliana d’aois agus trí bliana d’oideachas iar-bhunscoile faighte acu
The Junior Certificate examination is held at the end of the Junior Cycle in post-primary schools and students normally sit the exam at the age of 15 or 16
Reáchtáltar scrúdú an Teastais Shóisearaigh ag deireadh na Sraithe Sóisearaí i scoileanna iar-bhunscoile
Twenty-six subjects are currently available but not all schools offer them
Tá sé ábhar agus fiche ar fáil faoi láthair ach ní bhíonn siad ar fad ar fáil i ngach scoil
You can view the Junior Cycle syllabus and curriculum information here
Tá eolas faoi shiollabas agus curaclam na n-ábhar ar fáil
All students must follow courses in Irish (except where that student is exempt from studying Irish), English, mathematics and civic, social and political education
Ní mór do gach dalta cúrsaí a leanacht sa Ghaeilge (ach amháin i gcás díolúine), sa Bhéarla, sa Mhatamaitic agus san Oideachas Saoránaíoch, Sóisialta agus Polaitiúil
There may be other compulsory subjects, depending on the type of school
D’fhéadfadh go mbeadh ábhair éigeantacha eile i gceist ag brath ar chineál na scoile
The Junior Certificate School Programme
Clár Scoile an Teastais Shóisearaigh

The Junior Certificate School Programme (JCSP) has been designed to help young people who are at risk of leaving school early and who would benefit from special support when they are working towards the Junior Certificate

Leagadh amach Clár Scoile an Teastais Shóisearaigh d’fhonn cuidiú le daoine óga a bheadh i mbaol an scoil a fhágáil go luath agus a mbainfeadh tairbhe as cúnamh speisialta agus iad ag obair leis an Teastas Sóisearach a bhaint amach
Schools that offer the programme are given extra resources in order to facilitate teachers to develop a team approach to supporting the students
Bíonn acmhainní breise ag scoileanna a thairgíonn an clár d’fhonn cuidiú le múinteoirí cur chuige an mheithil a chothú maidir le cúnamh a thabhairt do na daltaí
All students participating in the Junior Certificate School Programme must be entered for the Junior Certificate examination
Leanann daltaí atá ag seasamh Clár Scoile an Teastais Shóisearaigh gnáthshiollabas an Teastais Shóisearaigh
All JCSP students are entitled to a profile - this is an individualised record of their achievement

Ní mór gach dalta atá ag glacadh páirt i Clár Scoile an Teastais Shóisearaigh a chur isteach ar scrúdú an Teastais Shóisearaigh agus tá gach dalta a ndearnadh próifíl air i dteideal próifíl a fháil, tuairisc faoi leith ar a bhfuil bainte amach ag an dalta sin
This profile is in addition to the Junior Certificate
Sa bhreis ar an Teastas Sóisearach an phróifíl sin
A review of the JCSP will take place in 2014
Beidh athbhreithniú ar an Clár Scoile an Teastais Shóisearaigh ann i 2014
